nodes.text: The Battles of the Black Delve were a series of conflicts that occurred in the region known as the Black Delve during the 690s BBY. The Galactic Republic's Judicial Forces played a key role in the conflict.
The Battles of the Black Delve were first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide The Essential Guide to Warfare, but no information was given beyond the name and the Judicial Forces' involvement.
